title: Himi 284
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
Ko e ‘Eiki ko Sihova,
Ko e ‘Eiki māfimafi;
Ko ia pē ‘oku pule,
’I hēvani mo māmani,
’Oku ‘alo’ofa ia,
Ki he kakai angahia.
2.
Na’e tuku mai ‘e ia,
‘Ene lea fakalelei,
Ki he kakai tō ki lalo,
‘Oku nofo ‘i māmani,
Koe’uhi ke tau ilo,
‘Etau tu’utāmaki lahi.
3.
He ko hotau akonaki
’A e folofola tapu,
‘I he ngaahi me’a ke fai,
Mo e me’a ke tau tuku,
Pea ‘oku fekau ia,
Mou lau, ’i he folofola.
4.
Ke tau fa’a fakafeta’i
Ki he Tamai anga’ofa,
‘I he’ene foaki mai,
‘A hono ‘Alo ko Sīsū,
Ke ne fakamonū’ia,
‘A māmani kotoa pē. *
